content.name: Central Star
content.description: Gravitational attractor at screen center. Collision is fatal. Exerts inverse-square gravity on all physics objects.
content.lore: The star creates the strategic tension in Spacewar! Players must balance avoiding the deadly gravity well while using it to curve torpedo trajectories.
content.gameplay_notes: Original used simplified inverse-square gravity. Capture radius of 1 unit for collision detection. Immobile at screen center (0, 0).
